product_usj_banner_subtitle: Step inside the cinematic world of Universal Studios Japan with guaranteed access by simply showing your QR Code. Meet your favorite characters here in USJ in nine different themed areas that include Water World, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter, Minion Park, and Amityville. Ride through the skies with Harry Potter in the Flight of the Hippogriff. Buy your own wand at Ollivanders and cast spells throughout the park! You can also fly through the sky with the world’s most beloved beagle in The Flying Snoopy or go on a boat ride with Elmo in Elmo’s Bubble Bubble. To end the night, catch the Universal Spectacle Night Parade. With 105 acres of pure entertainment, Universal Studios Japan is perfect for kids and adults alike!
product_usj_faq_question1: What is the difference between a Studio Ticket and an Express Pass?
product_usj_faq_answer1: A Studio Ticket is required to gain access to Universal Studios. An Express Pass needs to be paired with a Studio Ticket and gives you express access to certain attractions.
product_usj_faq_question2: Can I change the date for my Express Pass?
product_usj_faq_question3: What happens when an Express Pass attraction is closed for maintenance?
product_usj_faq_answer2: No. Unfortunately, Express Passes cannot be changed once they are issued.
product_usj_faq_answer3: In the event an Express Pass attraction is closed, you will be able to choose another attraction that does not require a designated entry time. Refunds will not be granted. For example, if you purchased an Express Pass 4: Standard, you can choose all the attractions except for Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey and Despicable Me Minion Mayhem.

product_usj_faq_question4: Can I enter the park on any date?
product_usj_faq_question5: Can I re-enter the park after I have left?
product_usj_faq_answer4: As long as your ticket type is the same for both dates, you can enter the park on any given date. Express Passes can only be used on the designated date. For example, Ticket A may enter on any date that is marked Ticket A pricing (refer to calendar on product page for more details).
product_usj_faq_answer5: Re-entry is not permitted. Re-entry is only permitted for special events such as Universal Studios Japan Countdown Party 2019 Pass.

transportation_index_qa_6_content_japan: ・Please use alcohol-based sanitizer to clean your hands before boarding an express bus {{ change_line_tag }}Currently, major express buses are equipped with alcohol-based sanitizers for passengers to use, please refer to each bus company's official website for their COVID-19 prevention measures. Passengers are recommended to prepare their own alcohol-based sanitizers or sanitizer wipes for disinfection purposes.{{ change_line_tag }}{{ change_line_tag }}・Face Masks{{ change_line_tag }}Passengers are encouraged to wear a face mask before, during, and after a bus ride. Please note that only certain bus companies offer free face masks to their passengers. By wearing a face mask, passengers can safeguard their health and avoid dry throat caused by the air-conditioner on a bus. {{ change_line_tag }}{{ change_line_tag }} ・Practice social distancing when at a bus station or selecting a seat{{ change_line_tag }} When you are waiting for a bus at a bus station or selecting a seat, please maintain a safe distance between yourself and others. Certain bus companies implement checkerboard seating to ensure minimum contacts between passengers, please comply accordingly.
transportation_index_qa_5_content_japan: ・Baggage Allowance for Buses{{ change_line_tag }}Each passenger may deposit 1 suitcase provided that the sum of the suitcase's length, width, and height is under 100 cm. Exceeding the 100-cm restriction will result in deposit decline. Each bus company applies different baggage allowance policies, but pretty much all bus companies adhere to those of airlines. Be mindful that certain express buses are not equipped with a baggage storage room, please contact KKday customer service before booking if you need such facilities.{{ change_line_tag }}{{ change_line_tag }}・Items not allowed in baggage storage rooms{{ change_line_tag }}Hazardous goods (e.g. flammables, explosives, sharp items, etc.)/folding bicycles/large instruments/pets/golf kits/snowboards or other sports gears. Please do not deposit fragile items or valuables in a storage room, as the bus company will not be responsible for your items' safety and compensation liability.

When reserving, you can seperately write in the name of the driver. But the driver has to have the qualification that matches the insurance requirement of the rented vehicle (age and license acquisition date).

car_rentals_index_qa_11_title_korea: Are there extra costs for the charging of electric cars?
car_rentals_index_qa_10_content_korea: You can rent by day. If you want to rent for a period of less than a day, please follow these instructions: Please choose the earliest return time on the next day as your return date and start processing your car return earlier. (Please keep in mind that no refunds will be granted for the unused hours if you return your car earlier)
car_rentals_index_qa_10_title_korea: Can I rent for only a day or for a few hours?
car_rentals_index_qa_9_content_korea: If you are a foreigner, please bring your passport and international driver’s license. Please also check the expiry date on your passport and international driver’s license.{{ change_line_tag }}*You need to have basic communication skills in Korean to rent a car. On-site staff will give explanations regarding the precautions and car insurance. If you cannot communicate in Korean, your car rental service may be canceled.
car_rentals_index_qa_9_title_korea: What documents should I bring if I am a foreigner who needs to rent a car?
car_rentals_index_qa_8_content_korea: We only provide our car rental service for a maximum of 1 week. If you would like to rent a car for more than 7 days, please refer to the following:{{change_line_tag}}- A separate payment is required{{change_line_tag}}- There is no need for you to return your car during your car rental period{{change_line_tag}}- Car rental companies that allow a maximum rental period of 10 days: Jeju EV Electric Rent Car, See you Rent Car{{change_line_tag}}- Car rental companies that allow a maximum rental period of 14 days: Baly Rent Car (You can only extend your rental period once){{change_line_tag}}- For car rental services under Jeju OK Rent Car, please notify customer service after making a reservation*During peak season, the number of vehicles is limited, so it may be difficult to extend your car rental period. Please contact us in advance if you need to extend your car rental period
car_rentals_index_qa_8_title_korea: What if I want to rent a car for longer than a week?
car_rentals_index_qa_7_content_korea: Yes, it is correct. You can only check or make reservations for dates within 3 months at the moment. Since prices are subject to immediate changes due to various factors, we are unable to open slots later than 3 months from now.
car_rentals_index_qa_7_title_korea: We can only check car rental dates within 3 months on the website. Is that correct?
car_rentals_index_qa_6_content_korea: Zzimcar provides a comparison of the prices in real time. Information such as discount prices and the vehicle’s current status/availability will change in real time; thus, you cannot make changes after you have made a reservation. If you need to make any changes, please cancel and make another reservation. For requests such as extending your car rental time by 1–2 hours, please check with your car rental company regarding the availability of the vehicle and the amount of additional fees required.
car_rentals_index_qa_6_title_korea: What should I do if I want to change the car pickup date/time or vehicle type?
car_rentals_index_qa_5_content_korea: Agreement to Zzimcar’s Cancellation Fee Policy{{change_line_tag}}This order will be subject to the terms of use of Zzimcar's car rental service. Your refund will be processed after the handling fee has been deducted.{{change_line_tag}}- Full refund in the case of cancellation 72 hours before your scheduled rental time{{change_line_tag}} - A 30% handling fee will be required for cancellation within 72 hours of your scheduled rental time{{ change_line_tag }}- No refunds are allowed for cancellations after your scheduled rental time{{change_line_tag}}**The handling fee is 30% of the total car rental fee insurance fee additional fees, all before discount
car_rentals_index_qa_5_title_korea: What are the rules regarding the cancellation fee?
car_rentals_index_qa_4_content_korea: If your cruise or flight has been cancelled due to weather conditions, you can apply for a full refund. Please contact the customer service center and be sure to include a certificate with proof of cancellation issued by your cruise line or airline when applying for refunds.{{change_line_tag}}*Full refunds do not apply in the case of stricter Covid restrictions imposed by the government due to the COVID-19 pandemic{{change_line_tag}}*If the date on the cancellation certificate does not match the car rental date, you may not be able to receive a full refund, or you may be additionally charged for handling fees. (e.g. if the flight or cruise cancellation date is June 10, but the car rental date is June 11)
car_rentals_index_qa_4_title_korea: My flight was cancelled. Can I get a refund if I can't pick up my car due to flight cancellation?

component_question_europe_description_8: Stay alert to announcements from rail units and train stations in Europe. You may contact us for further assistance.
component_question_europe_description_7: There is a character limit for European train tickets. The train tickets are still valid even if your name is not fully shown. Make sure that your full passport name is correctly entered when booking European train tickets without any mistakes.
component_question_europe_description_6: Stay connected with us for promotion updates. Most European train tickets are bookable up to 3-6 months in advance to train departure. European train tickets tend to be cheaper when you book them up to 2-3 months in advance. Always book your European train tickets as early as you can before the arrival in Europe.
component_question_europe_description_5: In most cases, your European train tickets include luggage {{#b}}(except Ouigo Spain tickets){{/b}}. The general rule is that travelers can carry one item of main luggage per passenger plus one smaller item of hand luggage.{{ change_line_tag }} The luggage regulations may vary from time to time and may differ from journey to journey. Please refer to the conditions of rail units.
component_question_europe_description_4: Please refer to the fare conditions of your European train ticket. European train tickets are always offered in different fare conditions: non-refundable, fully or partially refundable (with or without penalty fee), non-exchangeable, fully or partially exchangeable (with or without penalty fee). The booking fee is non-refundable.
component_question_europe_description_3: Sorry, the seat selection for European trains is not available at the moment. The seat would be automatically assigned. Travelers in the same order would be assigned to sit together when possible. However, travelers in separate orders may not be able to sit together.
component_question_europe_description_2: You will either receive your e-ticket in PDF format or a PNR (withdrawal reference or collection reference) digitally via APP or email.{{ change_line_tag }} In most cases, you will receive your e-ticket in PDF format with the train journey information and a QR code or barcode digitally via APP or email. You can save and present it as a screen ticket directly on your mobile devices for train boarding and inspection. {{ change_line_tag }} If your device battery dies or screen is cracked and you are unable to show a valid e-ticket and its QR code or barcode for inspection, it will be treated the same as any other customer unable to provide any other type of ticket, in line with the rail authority’s ticketless travel policy. You will need to purchase another ticket and may be subject to payment of a fine/penalty. It is recommended to save it in different mobile devices or print out the e-ticket.{{ change_line_tag }} In some cases, you will receive a PNR (withdrawal reference or collection reference) digitally via APP or email. You will need to retrieve, print and collect your physical paper ticket at the self-service machine or at the ticket office at the train stations in Europe in advance with any valid credit card and a PNR (withdrawal reference or collection reference) for train boarding and inspection.{{ change_line_tag }} The ticketing method of European train tickets may vary from time to time and may differ from journey to journey. Please refer to the instructions shown on the booking platform.
component_question_europe_description_1: 1) Your train may not have been offered for sale yet. Most European train tickets are bookable up to 3-6 months before departure. Please try again later.{{ change_line_tag }} 2) Works may be planned on your journey or the train may be full and sold out. Please try an alternative journey or train.

KHSR_Package_train_rule_description:
1.THSR seats are assigned by the system and therefore travellers can't select seats or carriages (continuous seat
allocation is not guaranteed). Furthermore, if the selected train is fully booked, we will book another train that
departs within 2 hours before or after the selected departure time.
2. Please contact KKday customer support for any changes and cancellations to the THSR tickets in
the KKday x HSR Combo package.
THSR stations will not be able to assist in this matter

circumstances. In this case, physical tickets will be sent to the provided address after you've been notified.
